Tumidzai Rhori yenyu Zita.\n\nTip: Tsvagai zita rinonakidza riri nyore kubata, kuti vanhu vafadzwe naro uye vade kukupai basa. Pane here chakatsaukana parhori yenyu kana pabasa ramunobata? Chii chamungada kuti customer izive? e.g. pamwe hamutakure zvinenge mvura, kana kuti rhori yenyu inomhanyisa. Apa ndipo panowanzogara midziyo yenyu. Munogona kushandisa nzvimbo yazviri pari zvino kana kusarudza imwe nzvimbo yazvingawanikwa.\n\nTip: Zviri nani uye nyore kushandisa nzvimbo yamunenge muri panguva iyoyo \"nzvimbo yandiri pari zvino\", saka edzai kunyoresa muri panzvimbo pane midziyo yacho pamunenge muri. Iyi imari yamunochaja pakiromita zvichienderana nepamuri nekune munhu ari kuda rubatsiro rwenyu. Bayai apa, kana muchipa rubatsiro kumapoka evarimi. Richabva rashanduka ruvara roita pink. Kana zvisina kudaro, rhori yenyu haizoonekwi nemapoka ari kutsvaga rubatsiro. Uyu muripo wemafuta unodiwa pakiromita rega rega Nyorai makiromita amunobvumira midziyo yenyu kufamba. Inofanirwa kutangira pa 10km.
Rhori inokwanisa kutakura matani mangani? Izvi zvichabatanidzwa nehuwandu hwezvinoda kutakurwa nemurimi, kuti azive kuti zvichaita nzendo ngani. Rhori yenyu inotora nguva yakadii pa100km? Izvi zvinoshandiswa kuti kuti rwendo ruchatora nguva yakadii. Munochaja marii pakiromita? Kuitira rwendo ruchafambwa nerhori yakatakura. Iyi imari yamunochaja pamutoro wega wega unotakurwa nerhori.
Ipai zita rebasa ramunoita kana rubatsiro rwamunopa.\n\nTip:Shandisai zita rinokwezva varimi kuti vade kushandirwa kana kubatsirwa nemi. Pane here zvakatsaukana pamusoro pebasa ramunoita kana rubatsiro rwamunopa? Chii chamungada kuti varimi vazive? e.g. mune mhando yakatsarukana yefurawu yamunogadzira. Bayai apa, kana muchipa rubatsiro kana mabasa kumapoka evarimi. Richabva rashanduka ruvara roita pink. Kana zvisina kudaro, mhinduro yenyu haizoonekwi nemapoka ari kutsvaga rubatsiro. Dzimwe nzvimbo dzekuitira mabasa hadzigoni kufambiswa, asi varimi jdivo vanotofamba kuendesa zvirimwa kwadziri. \'Zvinogona Kufamba\' zvichireva kuti zvinogona kufamba. Fungidzirai masaga anogona kushandirwa pa awa yega yega. Zvinobatsira kuti murimi azive nguva yose inodiwa Imarii kushandira saga rimwe chete? Pane here muganhu pahuwandu hwemasaga anofanirwa kuvepo kuti mutambire chichemo chokuitirwa basa chemurimi? Mafuta anodiwa pasaga rimwechete.
Tumidzai Tarakita yenyu Zita.\n\nTip: Tsvagai zita rinonakidza riri nyore kubata, kuti vanhu vafadzwe naro uye vade kushandisa tarakita yenyu. Pane here zvakatsaukana pamusoro petarakita yenyu? Chii chamungada kuti varimi vazive? e.g. munorima zvakadzika zvakadii? Bayai apa, kana muchipa rubatsiro kana mabasa kumapoka evarimi. Richabva rashanduka ruvara roita pink. Kana zvisina kudaro, mhinduro yenyu haizoonekwi nemapoka ari kutsvaga rubatsiro.
Nyorai zita kana mhando yetarakita yenyu. Rine horse power yakadii? Rakagadzirwa gore ripi?
Tarakita renyu rinotora nguva yakareba zvakadii kushanda pahekita imwechete? Munochaja marii pahekita, Rangarirai kuti mari iyi haisanganisire yemafuta. Vamwe varimi ndoyavanoti \'dry-rate\' Munochaja marii yemafuta pahekita? Vamwe varimi vanonzwisisa \'wet-rates\', asi chiri kubvunzwa pano i \'wet-rate\' isina \'dry-rate\'. Tapota kukura kwemunda pamunotangira kuti tarakita yenyu ishande.
Iyi ndiyo password yenyu yamuchashandisa kupinda mu AgriShare. Inofanirwa kutangira pamanhamba mana. FilteredEquipmentListActivity NotificationsActivity BookingsActivity SearchActivity MapActivity
Tapota sarudzai mhando kutanga kuti muone mazano aya. Mazano Bayai apa kana muchida kuziva zvimwe nezvenzvimbo dzokunyorera. Booking yekanzurwa nemazvo. AgriShare Commission ZvebasaRisinaKupera Tapota tsanangurai nemhaka yei basa risina kupera. Ari kuita basa achaziviswa. Basa ranzi harisati rapera. Ari kuita basa achaziviswa. Tsanangudzo yemutoro unoda kutakurwa Tapota ipai tsanangudzo yemutoro wamunoda kuti utakurwe.
Rhori iripo pamwechete nemafuta Tapota batidza network yako kana GPS woedza zvakare. Muripo Watambirwa Kubhadhara Kwaramba Zvabhadharwa
